de.lmu.dbs.jforest.core
Class Forest

java.lang.Object
  de.lmu.dbs.jforest.core.Forest
Direct Known Subclasses:
Forest2d
public abstract class Forest
extends java.lang.Object

Abstract core implementation of a random decision forest inspired by the implementation of Microsoft Kinect body part recognition system. The design is generic so this implementation can serve for many different classification purposes.

Dependencies:

  • Colt (sparse matrix, random algorithms)
  • JDom 2.0.2 (for XML parsing)
  • Trove 3.0.3

Author:
Thomas Weber

nodeThreadingThreshold

public int nodeThreadingThreshold
Threshold below which the algorithm switches into node threading. If not set, node threading will be disabled.

          throws java.lang.Exception
Loads a trained forest from file. Each tree is stored in one file.

Parameters:
